mapper.select: select (select CAST(count('1') AS CHAR) from SYS_AUTHZ_USER_LIST a where a.U_USERNAME = #{username}) U_COUNT, (select CAST(count('1') AS CHAR) from SYS_AUTHZ_USER_LIST b where b.U_USERNAME = #{username} and b.U_PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) P_COUNT, (select CAST(count('1') AS CHAR) from SYS_AUTHZ_USER_LIST c,SYS_AUTHZ_USER_ROLE_RELATION x where c.U_ID = x.U_ID and c.U_USERNAME = #{username}) R_COUNT, IFNULL((select CAST(IFNULL(d.U_STATUS,'0') AS CHAR) from SYS_AUTHZ_USER_LIST d where d.U_USERNAME = #{username}),'0') U_STATUS, (select d.U_SALT from SYS_AUTHZ_USER_LIST d where d.U_USERNAME = #{username}) as U_SALT from dual

select (select CAST(count('1') AS CHAR) from SYS_AUTHZ_USER_LIST a where a.U_USERNAME = #{username}) U_COUNT, (select CAST(count('1') AS CHAR) from SYS_AUTHZ_USER_LIST c,SYS_AUTHZ_USER_ROLE_RELATION x where c.U_ID = x.U_ID and c.U_USERNAME = #{username}) R_COUNT, IFNULL((select CAST(IFNULL(d.U_STATUS,'0') AS CHAR) from SYS_AUTHZ_USER_LIST d where d.U_USERNAME = #{username}),'0') U_STATUS, (select d.U_SALT from SYS_AUTHZ_USER_LIST d where d.U_USERNAME = #{username}) as U_SALT from dual
